attributes.action: Reintroduction of National Service for 12 Months after leaving school
attributes.additional_details: To reintroduce National Service for school leavers for 12 months. Not only to help instil self discipline, self respect and respect for others but to give a taste of what forces life could offer. A sense of structure and cohesion to a youngsters life where this maybe missing in a modern dysfunctional family life, as well as a lifetime skilful career.
